message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.HC. 

This paper proposes a novel approach for automatically generating review responses for mobile apps. The approach involves learning knowledge relations between reviews and their responses, and incorporates review attributes such as user rating and review length. This work is related to natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) as it involves generating responses to user reviews, and machine learning (ML) as it involves learning relations between reviews and responses. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CY (Computers and Society), and cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction).
